name: Danny & Rosses
description:
Twenty years ago, 8-year-old me made this "game" in my notebook, using my fingers to control the locations of the characters and monsters. I finished this game minutes before my 29th birthday, so I can say it took me 20 years to make this game instead of 21 years 🙃

The original concept of this game can be found here!

Special thanks to my childhood classmate, Paul, for unwittingly being the first play tester for this game!

https://github.com/Alindah/Danny_and_Rosses
